snippet.title: DEAD OR ALIVE 6 - Deluxe Beta Demo Feb. 22nd- 24th
snippet.description:
The Deluxe Demo will be exclusive to PlayStation PLUS subscribers through the PlayStation Store and Xbox Live Gold members through the Microsoft Store, and will be playable February 22, 2019 beginning at 7:00 a.m. PST and run through February 24 at 11:59 p.m. PST.

 The upcoming demo will consist of online Ranked matches, as well as Free Training, Tutorial, Command Training, Combo Challenge, and an introduction to Story mode. The Demo will feature all 24 characters available at launch and all hairstyles and glasses will be available for each of the playable characters.  

Additional information for the deluxe demo here:
https://teamninja-studio.com/doa6/us/news190215c.html

[official site] http://teamninja-studio.com/doa6/
[official twitter] https://twitter.com/DOATEC_OFFICIAL
[official facebook] https://facebook.com/deadoralivegame
[official twitch] https://twitch.tv/Deadoralivegame

#DEADORALIVE6 #DOA6 #DeluxeDemo
